project_description: I contributed to an existing research project in which I was tasked with developing a knowledge graph-based recommendation system. I leveraged Neo4j's entity-relationship data structure to store medical ontologies in a machine readable format, allowing for accurate retrival of ontology definitions for medical experts.

I work with a team to develop an AI-powered intelligent tutoring system designed to personalize students' learning environments through scaffolding. Our system is meant to address long-standing problems with standardized curriculums by tailoring learning structure for various learning styles. Currently also exploring cloud hosting for the demo.

I created a website where I host my collection of artworks and illustrations I have made over the years since high school. My website includes different kinds of art from comics, single illustrations and animations. I am also currently working on a backend to store my artworks and allow commenting on posts.

I collaborated with a team to work on a capstone project where we built a client-server architecture that simulates the use of computer hardware of vehicles to execute jobs such as image processing, file storage etc. The system is complete with a frontend GUI and a backend server.

Built a static website to display public information about a biophysics research group based in Colombia. The website provides information about the team's areas of research, members, publications and contact information.

Participated in a kaggle competition where I competed against 15 other developers to use the regression model that can most accurately predict the quality of wine given sample training data. I conducted numerous training I finished in fourth place.

project_name: Billiards Sol y Luna Order Tracking Desktop App
project_description: For many years, my family's business has been catering to customers in a pool hall. Current methods of tracking orders are tedious and unreliable. To solve this issue, I created an order tracking system for our business. The program maintains an order history, tracked orders, pool table timers and debt status to resolve disputes.

Recently, I have observed that people coming into the business recently mention that they found the business on google. I decided to work on a website to display public information about the establishment, what we offer and contact information. This website is a work in progress.
